### **Salmonid Fin Clipping and Coded Wire Tag (CWT) Application**
#### **Title and Reference**
Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) **30002308a**

#### **Issuance Details**
Date of Publication | 24 January 2023
Tender Closing Date | Wednesday, 17 February 2023 - 1:00 PM (PST)

#### **Contract Details**
Procurement Category | Service (SRV)
Trade Agreements | None
Regional Opportunities | British Columbia
Contracting Entity | Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Contract Address | 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

#### **Technical Requirements**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) may require fin clipping and/or coded-wire tagging of juvenile salmonids at selected DFO hatcheries and DFO-contracted hatcheries throughout British Columbia. The objective of the contract is to complete high-quality fin clipping and/or coded-wire tagging activities of juvenile salmonids.

#### **Scope of Work**
Fin clipping and application of coded-wire tags (CWTs) will be conducted to:

- Identify fish for harvest in fisheries
- Estimate total catch and distribution for inclusion in international management models
- Assess rebuilding efforts in stocks of concern

The contractor will provide services in accordance with established procedures, and deliverables will adhere to the tasks and technical specifications outlined in the statement of work.

#### **Period of Standing Offer**
The standing offer is effective from the award date to 31 January 2028.
